hero.title: Passion for Pizza
hero.description: Family-owned pizzeria in the heart of Östersund with 16+ years of tradition and quality.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From a dream to Östersund's favorite pizzeria
story.p1: It all started in 2008 when Shaip Dixies opened the doors to Pizzeria Spader Kung on Regementsgatan 5 in Östersund. With a passion for Italian food culture and a vision to serve genuine pizzas.
story.p2: Over the years we have grown and evolved, but our love for craftsmanship and quality has always remained the same. Every pizza is still baked with the same care as day one.
story.p3: Today we are proud to be part of Östersund's food scene and to serve hundreds of satisfied guests every day.

loveFood.title: Love for Food
loveFood.desc: Every pizza is baked with passion and care. We use only fresh ingredients.

familyOwned.title: Family Owned
familyOwned.desc: Since 2008 we have been part of Östersund's food culture with personal service.

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.desc: We never compromise on quality. Swedish ingredients and traditional recipes.

wideSelection.title: Wide Selection
wideSelection.desc: From classic pizzas to pan pizzas, kebab and salads. Also gluten-free options.

start.title: The Beginning
start.desc: Pizzeria Spader Kung opened its doors on Regementsgatan in Östersund.

expand.title: Expansion
expand.desc: We expanded the menu with pan pizzas and introduced gluten-free options.

today.title: Today
today.desc: One of Östersund's most appreciated pizzerias with a 4.0 rating.

team.title: Meet Our
team.desc: Behind every pizza is a dedicated team of experienced pizza chefs and kitchen masters. We love what we do and strive to give every guest a fantastic experience.

offer.title: What We Offer
offer.subtitle: More than just pizza – a complete dining experience

classicPizza.title: Classic Pizza
classicPizza.desc: Traditional pizzas baked in a stone oven with a thin crispy crust.

panPizza.title: Pan Pizza
panPizza.desc: Thick, soft crust with generous toppings. Perfect for big appetites.

salads.title: Salads & More
salads.desc: Fresh salads, kebab dishes, pasta and à la carte. Also gluten-free options.

cta.subtitle: Discover why we are one of Östersund's most loved pizzerias
